dct_title_s: Brutalist Berlin map = Brutalismus-Stadtplan Berlin / text and photography by Felix Torkar ; design by Supergroup Studios ; map data from OpenStreetMap.
dct_description_sm: Publisher statement and ISBN from paper band. Text, indexed directory of buildings, and illustrations of selected buildings on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: [London, England] : Published by Blue Crow Media, 2021.
